text: Perumugai is a panchayat village in Gobichettipalayam taluk in Erode District of Tamil Nadu state, India. It is about 12 km from Gobichettipalayam and 44 km from district headquarters Erode. The village is located on the road connecting Gobichettipalayam with Athani, Tamil Nadu via Kallipatti. Perumugai has a population of about 8692. ==References== Category:Villages in Erode district
title: Perumugai
